CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 23, 1953, pg. 33, reads: "Scenes From Weil School Operetta - When the operetta, 'Sourwood Mountain,' directed by Mrs. Ernestine Parks and James Miller, was produced at A. Leo Weil School on Tuesday, May 19, these were two of the many scenes in production. In the left photo, Rachelle Brust, who portrays a Gypsy, twits Donald Pittman for tasting her stew while the Gypsy chorus of students looks on... - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Actors Rachelle Brust standing over campfire, and Donald Pittman kneeling beside her, in production of operetta "Sourwood Mountain" at A. Leo Weil School
